titleStmt.title: A further defence of the report Vindicating it from Mr. Alsops Cavils, and shewing the difference between Mr. W's and my self to be real, and the charge in my appeal to be true.
titleStmt.author: Lobb, Stephen, d. 1699.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Nath. Hiller, at the Princes Arms in Leaden-Hall-Street, over against St. Mary Axe,

notesStmt.note: Preface signed: S.L. i.e. Stephen Lobb.
With advertisment at foot of p. [8].
Reproduction of the original at the Congregational Library, London.

place.placeName: the Princes Arms in Leaden-Hall-Street, over against St. Mary Axe
